name: Monster Truck Parking Simulator - 3D Car Bus Driving & Racing Games
name_original: Monster Truck Parking Simulator - 3D Car Bus Driving & Racing Games
description:
Are you ready to play an Extreme Monster Truck Parking Game?

Play dozens of super challenging and fun parking missions!!

Hop into crazy monster trucks and test your parking skills around the city!!

Go on! But be careful: highly addictive!
